title: URL Shortener - Mikrouli.link
description: A modern URL shortener application built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS. Features custom short URLs, analytics tracking, QR code generation, and a clean, responsive interface for managing links efficiently.

title: React Color Palette Generator
description: An intuitive color palette generator built with React that creates harmonious color schemes based on your selected base color. Features multiple color harmony algorithms, export functionality, and accessibility considerations.

title: JepeNotes - React Notes App
description: A clean and minimalist notes application built with React and Tailwind CSS. Features markdown support, local storage persistence, search functionality, and an intuitive user interface for organizing thoughts and ideas.
